description:
Correlate paired rows between two cifti files.

For each row in <cifti-a>, correlate it with the same row in <cifti-b>, and put the result in the same row of <cifti-out>, which has only one column.

opt_fisher_z.title: opt_fisher_z
opt_fisher_z.description: apply fisher small z transform (ie, artanh) to correlation

opt_override_mapping_check.title: opt_override_mapping_check
opt_override_mapping_check.description: don't check the mappings for compatibility, only check length
